1. Checkmark (for: Core Concepts, Advantages, Types, When to Use, Load Balancing Algorithms):
   d="M9 12.75L11.25 15 15 9.75M21 12a9 9 0 1 1-18 0 9 9 0 0 1 18 0z"

2. Alert/Warning (for: Disadvantages, Challenges, Common Pitfalls, Causes):
   d="M12 9v3.75m9-.75a9 9 0 1 1-18 0 9 9 0 0 1 18 0zm-9 3.75h.008v.008H12v-.008z"

   d="M7.5 21L3 16.5m0 0L7.5 12M3 16.5h18m0-11L16.5 12M21 5.5H3"
